text: it came to pass, when the trumpeters and singers were as one, to make one sound to be heard in praising and thanking Jehovah; and when they lifted up their voice with the trumpets and cymbals and instruments of music, and praised Jehovah, <FI>saying<Fi> , For he is good; for his lovingkindness <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever; that then the house was filled with a cloud, even the house of Jehovah,
name: II Chronicles 5:13
